A/B testing interactive

Source: R/abtest.R
abtest_shiny.Rd

Launches a shiny app to A/B test

Usage

abtest_shiny(
  size_a = 100,
  size_b = 100,
  success_a = 10,
  success_b = 20,
  success_unit = "percent",
  sign_level = 0.05
)

Arguments

size_a

Size of Group A

size_b

Size of Group B

success_a

Success of Group A

success_b

Success of Group B

success_unit

"count" | "percent"

sign_level

Significance Level (typical 0.01/0.05/0.10)

Examples


# Only run examples in interactive R sessions
if (interactive())  {
   abtest_shiny()
}
